title: Stephen Bear labelled 'disgusting' after embarrassing woman for SECOND time on Celebs Go Dating
text:
Stephen Bear labelled 'disgusting' after embarrassing woman for SECOND time on Celebs Go Dating Stacey went on a second date with him but soon regretted it Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Stephen Bear ditches 'Blue Lips' for the second time Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Stephen Bear might have once won Celebrity Big Brother, but he wasn't a very popular man last night. 
Celebs Go Dating viewers turned against the reality star last night after he 'humiliated' his date for a second time. 
Bear had already lost the respect of the viewers when he ran out on Dakota just eight minutes into their date, sending a note for her saying he'd left a chicken in the oven - and leaving her with a bill for the food he ordered. 
Last night he went on his second date with 'Blue Lips', a name he has for a woman called Stacey because he can't remember her name and she wears blue lipstick. Stephen Bear en route to his second date (Photo: E4) 
Well, he was meant to be going on his second date. 
He had already swiftly ended their first, not actually telling her he was leaving and ditching her in a pub on her own. 
For some reason, she decided to give him a second chance and agreed to meet up with him again. She soon regretted it... (Photo: E4) 
But in the taxi on the way to the restaurant, he claimed he was going to really try to leave his 'Bear' character at home and be the real Stephen. 
Then he appeared to get cold feet, saying he couldn't do it and jumping out of the taxi, leaving Stacey sitting on her own in the restaurant for over an hour. Poor Blue Lips was left on her own (Photo: E4) 
Stacey eventually realised what was happening and called the dating agency to let Nadia Essex know she'd been stood up. 
One Twitter user didn't mince his words, saying: "What a disgusting piece of sh** Bear is. Leaving that poor girl high and dry. What a pr***." 
Another young woman commented: "I take it back what he did was f***ing awful. Who the hell does he think he is to do that to women." 
One said she hated Bear, adding: "His attitude to women is f***ing atrocious!! That poor girl how humiliating!!" 
The preview for tonight's show, played at the end of the episode, seemed to suggest that it might be the end of the road for Bear. 
Will Nadia and Eden finally kick him off? Tune in to E4 tonight at 10pm to find out. Like us on Facebook
